img.alt: graphic with 4 photos, food, we miss you sign, bulldog and ops logo with 'updates'

div.div: Otsego Public Schools Superintendent Jeff Haase and school administrators are in contact with county health officials and school districts as information unfolds on the novel coronavirus, or COVID-19. This is an evolving situation so we will keep you updated as we learn more and/or make any adjustments to activities at school. If you have specific health questions, please contact your doctor or county health department.

div.div: School Closure Plans for Otsego Public Schools - March 13, 2020, 4:00 pm.

div.a: Governor Whitmer News Release on Announcement

div.strong: Governor Whitmer announces closure of K-12 schools until April 5th: 11:00pm.

div.em: Governor Whitmer just held a news conference regarding the coronavirus and announced that she is ordering the closing of all K-12 schools for 3 weeks starting Monday, March 16th through Sunday, April 5th. Our spring break is scheduled for the following week so Otsego Public Schools will resume on Monday, April 13th. This is an unprecedented closure, so we will be meeting with various officials tomorrow to learn more. We will have additional information for our families Friday afternoon.
